gmd:organisationName.sdn:SDN_EDMOCode: Institute of Marine Research, Norwegian Marine Data Centre

gco:CharacterString.p: Measurements of hydrography, ocean currents, and turbulence microstructure at the Fåvne hydrothermal vent field, Mohn Ridge, Atlantic Mid-Ocean Ridge. Vessel-based survey and ocean floor mooring.
Turnover of an oceanographic mooring at Station M, North Atlantic.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SeaVoX salt and fresh water body gazetteer

gmd:code.gco:CharacterString: Weather Station Mike, 66 degrees N, 2 degrees E. Mohn Ridge, Fåvne hydrothermal vent field, 72 degrees 45.3 minutes N, 3 degrees 50 minutes E.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1205/2008 of 3 December 2008 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards metadata

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The data centres apply standard data quality control procedures on all data that the centres manage. Ask the data centre for details.

gmi:function.gco:CharacterString: Short-term mooring deployed and recovered (duration 5 days). Ocean currents: Nortek Signature 1000 ADCP. 2x Nortek Signature 500 ADCP. 2x Nortek Vector velocimeter. RDI Longranger 75kHz ADCP. Nephelometer and oxidation-reduction potential: Pacific Marine Laboratory (PMEL) National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Miniature Autonomous Plume Recorder (MAPR). Temperature and salinity loggers: SBE39 and SBE37.
